thread.title: IPL has helped me improve death bowling: Bhuvneshwar Kumar
thread.title_full: IPL has helped me improve death bowling: Bhuvneshwar Kumar - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: IPL has helped me improve death bowling: Bhuvneshwar Kumar
text:
*Rajkot:* The much-maligned Indian Premier League (IPL) on Saturday got a dose of positive response when swing bowler Bhuvneshwar Kumar credited the T20 League for improving him as a bowler at the death in limited overs cricket.
"IPL has helped me in improving my death bowling. I have been bowling the first few overs with new ... Â»
